驏字的基本解释

驏
zhàn
ch僴
见“骣”。

驏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhàn］
［《字彙》鉏版切］
“骣1”的繁体字。
骑马或其它牲畜不加鞍辔。参见“驏牛”、“驏騎”。

驏字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驏； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1445第09
【正字通】鉏版切，棧上聲。馬不施鞍轡爲驏。【吹萬集】驏，不鞍而騎也。【令狐楚·少年行】少小邊州慣放狂，驏騎蕃馬射黃羊。如今老大無筋力，獨倚營門數鴈行。

暂无。

驏
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhàn］
["Zihui" 鉏 edition cut]
"骣1" in traditional characters.
Riding horses or other livestock without saddles and bridles. See "pull cattle", "pull riding".
驏
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　驏; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1445 Page 09
【Zhengzitong】The plate is cut, and the stack sounds. Horses do not use saddles and bridles. [Blowing Wanji] You can ride without a saddle. [Linghu Chu·Juvenile Travel] Young Bianzhou is used to madness, riding a horse and shooting yellow sheep. Now the boss has no muscle strength, relying solely on the Yingmen and several geese.
